{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Brown chaos serpent big meat chunk | class = Demon2Chunk4 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]]→Demon2Chunk4
One of the five chunks of meat thrown around when a [[Classes:Demon2|brown chaos serpent]] is gibbed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Demon2Chunk4 : [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]] { States { Spawn: DMBD A 4 DMBD A 10 [[A_QueueCorpse]] DMBD A 20 Wait Death: DMBD A -1 Stop } }
